Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enacts the governing unaccredited representatives defrauding (GUARD) VA benefits act
Summary: Protects veterans from fraud and unaccredited representatives; institutes a civil penalty of up to $10,000 for violation; establishes the class A misdemeanor crime of unaccredited representation of a veteran; establishes a veterans' services fund.
LawCode: Add ยง29-e, Veterans' Services L; amd ยง349-f, Gen Bus L; add ยง190.90, Pen L; add ยง99-tt, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, the general business law, the penal law, and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "governing unaccredited representatives defrauding (GUARD) VA benefits act"
